## pandocli query block

Get block details

### Synopsis

Get block details.

```
pandocli query block [flags]
```

### Examples

```
pandocli query block --height=300
```

### Options

```
      --hash string   Block hash
      --height uint   height of the block
  -h, --help          help for block
```
